snippet: As mysteriously as the word appeared spray-painted on a garage door at the home of an interracial couple, it was covered up....

headline.main: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months
headline.print_headline: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months

lead_paragraph: As mysteriously as the word appeared spray-painted on a garage door at the home of an interracial couple, it was covered up.
